description:
make.bat: Fix for old files

Same fix as applied here: http://codereview.appspot.com/5761044

Fixes issue 3222.

messages.text:
Your change looks good to me. But you name is not listed in CONTRIBUTORS file. You need to agree to contributor license agreement, before we can submit your change. See http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright for instructions.

Alex

I've added Christopher to the AUTHORS and CONTRIBUTORS files.
Leaving this CL for Alex.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 2012/03/16 01:16:54, brainman wrote:
> Your change looks good to me. But you name is not listed in CONTRIBUTORS file.
> You need to agree to contributor license agreement, before we can submit your
> change. See http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright for instructions.
> 
> Alex

Ah, looks like I missed a bit in the guide.

Thanks.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d77371d5c280 ***
